com.sessionm.api
Interface SessionListener

public interface SessionListener

Session state listener interface.

Field Summary
static int INTERNAL_ERROR
          Indicates internal SDK error.
static int NETWORK_ERROR
          Indicates network access error.
static int SESSION_REFUSED
          Indicates that SessionM service has been refused.
static int USER_INELIGIBLE
          Indicates that the current is in ineligible for SessionM service.
 
Method Summary
 void onSessionFailed(SessionM instance, int error)
          Notifies that session has failed.
 void onSessionStarted(SessionM instance)
          Notifies that session has started.

          Deprecated. use onUserUpdated(SessionM, User) method instead
 void onUserUpdated(SessionM instance, User user)
          Notifies that player information has been updated.
